text: The Old Dualist-Religion of the Roma people called Romanipen is a simple belive in Devla-God and Beng-Satan .https://scholarlypublications.universiteitleiden.nl/access/item%3A2721940/view There is no holy books but Priests called Rashai derived from Rishi, the Priests wife is called Rashani.https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/ra%C5%9Baj Only Roma or partial roma can be members. == References == Category:Mythology
title: Romani folklore
